summary: Three-part mini-series set during three different eras in a single room of an odd hotel where employees never age. Every story has a slight twist to it, but the stories are mostly dialogue-heavy psychological or relationship dramas.
cast: Clark Heathcliff Brolly|Camilla Overbye Roos|Griffin Dunne|Crispin Glover|Glenne Headly|Freddie Jones|Deborah Kara Unger|Alicia Witt|Mariska Hargitay|Harry Dean Stanton|Chelsea Field|John Solari|Carl Sundstrom
title: Hotel Room
